title: My 4 project safes disappeared Help me riot
body: With this new patch my chests have disappeared, because ?? please riot if you can return them that happened ?? T_T{{item:3070}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Those were never meant to permanent items and were meant to have been opened during the event. They were never meant to last after Nov 6 2016.

> "Crafting materials will expire at 23:59 PST on November 6 along with the team emotes, recalls, and leftover PROJECT crafting materials as well."
